Короче сама игра.

Half-Life 2 is an excellent shooter.  The storytelling, world building, and characters all live up to the first game.  In fact, the characters in this game are even better.  However, I noticed while playing this game that the levels are a lot more linear and repetitive than the first game.  I enjoyed the game thoroughly.  It is, however, hard to say whether or not this one is better than the first one.  It probably is, everything about this game is an improvement over the first, but the first game FEELS a little better than this one.  Either way, both have been spectacular games which I reccommend.  Definitely deserving of their status.

Эту игру точно нужно комментировать? Ну что ж, пройдя в очередной раз халфлайф понимаешь насколько сейчас сильно деградировали игры. В каждой главе свой геймплей, свои механики. Про физику вообще молчу, это просто вынос мозга, сейчас такое уже не делают. ИИ противников тоже круто действует. В современных играх улучшается только графика, а сам геймплей тупо деградирует.

Why is Steam asking if I recommend this

An absolute masterpiece and probably Valve's finest work to date. The Source engine absolutely shines in Half-Life 2, and because of it the gameplay is crisp and the world-building is immaculate. The graphical quality was years ahead of its time back in 2004, and this game still looks phenomenal to this very day on maximum settings; the Source engine is capable of providing so much detail in textures, effects, and model animations. Great story with fun characters and a perfect blend of action, adventure, science fiction, survival horror, puzzles, and lighthearted comedy. The music is fantastic, even bringing back some of the best tracks from the first Half-Life game, and exploring levels for ammo, weapons, and Easter eggs is always interesting as well. There's a lot of reasons why Half-Life 2 is considered to be one of the greatest, most influential games ever made, so do yourself a favor: play this game and find out what those reasons are for yourself
